paper.title: Three approaches to the estimation of market model betas
paper.abstract: The article describes the portfolio market model based on bivariate normality of returns on an. individual and on the market portfolio. The parameters of the estimated market model are those of the regression function which we use for estimating the parameters of the market model. The investors are mostly interested in estimating betas what can be done either by creating classical confidence intervals, or by using Bayesian approach or by making direct use of the results of the simple regression.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要讨论了市场模型beta的估计方法，这是投资组合管理中用于衡量资产系统性风险的关键参数。论文中提到的回归方法和beta估计直接应用于投资组合的构建和风险管理，因此属于投资组合管理领域。
